choices: George Ingram: Charleston, SC: Fire creation/manipulation
Marcia Ashton:  Quato, Equedor: Can trace one's family lineage by touch
Justin Covington: Birmingham, England. Sonic Blasts or "a destructive voice"
1.content:
You sit at the office desk, looking at the printed off list of people with special abilities. You cannot believe your eyes. This is like Christmas for a kid. So many powers.... where to begin.






Current Location: New York City, New York
Powers Obtained So Far: Telekinesis
1.title: World at My finger tips

choices: Kirah Julania: Nagpur, India: Can speak any language after hearing one sentence
Micheal Jones: Paris, France. Can change his body into any mineral substance.
15.title: More Choices.

choices: Charlie Santiago: Cordova, Spain: Reanimation. Bring Corpses and bones to life.
Milissa Martugous: Rome, Italy. Can command plants.
155.content: And the list went on.
155.title: Still More Powers.

info.brief_description: YOU are the Villain.  Be Sylar and hunt down those with special abilities.
info.description:
You have just discovered "THE LIST" In it, is an extensive set of names of people with special abilities. Each item on the list contains the person's name, general location, and a brief description of their ability.

Rules:

*No killing off the main character.
*Any other "MAIN" or "CANONICAL" characters from the series may be used, (AND KILLED ;) )
*Most crossovers will be allowed, but please contact the original author for confirmation.
(don't want to end up with Sylar killing off Rachel Ray and then starting his own cooking show :P )
*I encourage you to be as graphic and gory as you like with the murders.
*Lastly. I think it will help the readers out to keep tabs on all the powers Sylar currently has. (though this could get to be too much, later on; we'll see.) So each time Sylar kills off a super, just copy and paste the previous list, and then add the new one.



Current Location: NEW YORK:
Powers, so Far: Telekinesis




So many powers, for a hungry super villain. Where to go first?
